post.body: Everyone was okay, including the other driver+passenger, who we believe was at fault (by speeding toward a blind intersection).
Everybody is okay, no injuries, but definitely shocked.
Playing Dragostea Din Tei so loud that I wouldn't be surprised if the woofer speaker vibrates itself off my dresser (its resting spot).
New Flickr photo:: Driver's side view of damage to driver's ed car http://bit.ly/kkZI
Look at photos of the driver's ed car accident I observed from the back seat: http://is.gd/bGZ7 Happened to bring the D40 with me today.
Uploading photos from the accident earlier 2day. Hopefully this'll serve as a reminder to A) not speed, and B) otherwise drive defensively.
Chliing out after a tirng day - going through newsfeeds in Google Reader while rocking out to Sweet Emotion (and other songs) on Pandora.
Wow - really hungry. Only ate a Snickers bar since breakfast. At least the trauma from the accident seems to have faded - now I'm just s ...
New Flickr photo:: Driver's Ed Car Accident http://bit.ly/7lDf
Tweeting from my aunt's BlackBerry Curve! Keyboard feels good.
Visiting my grandfather now. Will upload photos of the accident when I get home.
Say a woman in the drug store whe bought 400 speed 35mm film. No! Might as well buy a "disposable" digital camera.
Why do people in the subway hold their cell phones when they won't get anything close to a signal on a moving and underground train?
That was an interesting driver's ed class. Now going to Manhattan to visit my grandfather.
Done with the police, other instructor from driving school is taking us back to school. Cop said we'll be sore tomorrow morning.
Police are here, filing a report. Another instructor from the driving company also came.
Waiting for the police to come and fill a report.
Accident was at intersection of Fleet Street and 70 Avenue in Forest Hills.
Got into an accident in driver's ed car. Another student was driving, other motorist was most likely speeding. Everyone is okay, but sho ...
Left school early for the makeup driving class (for the second to last Friday when our instructor was sick). Missing one of my *favorite ...
For all you lucky kids north of NYC, it's not snowing here. Rain, slush, general nastiness. Not going to B&H like I wanted to.
I find it ironic tthat I go to sleep earlier on nights before vacation days than when I need to wake up for school the next morning. D'oh.
Sprint finally announces BlackBerry Curve 8350i: http://is.gd/cKYY I bet the data is just as bad as on the Motorola Falcon-series phones.
Bothers' CRT monitor seems like it's almost busted. But we're not swapping it for LCD because they toss around footballs in their room.
Oh gawd - watching Evolution of Dance - http://tinyurl.com/kvrl7
Gimme some morality, will ya? http://www.cnn.com/2008/US/12/19/california.proposition/index.html
Saw at least two reviews of Nikon SLR bettery grips that say they make you look more pro. Sad. I'd say "Look at my Flickr photostream".
Annoyed that Twitter.com stalls on posting my tweets.
Pandora is feeding of lots of Tom Petty songs now (Classic Rock station). Not necessarily my favorite, but listening to get variety.
Principal texted of to tell me there's no school tomorrow due to pending snow. I'm beginning to like my school somewhat more now.
New Flickr photo:: Confusing navigation on Nikon's site http://bit.ly/i4Ds
Not liking the nasty weather outside. My hands are pretty cold. The snow isn't that bad; it's the fact that it's now RAINING (and cold).
To all those (without inserting an opinionated adjective) people who are upset at Apple's MacWorld decision: Save money and just don't go.
Say a Jeep slipping and sliding on the snowy street. A Jeep, of all cars. Drive carefully and safely folks.
How much more efficient is Software Update on OS X than Windows Update on XP? (Vista's is okay.)
Installing the newest version of Trend Micro Internet Security, then a Microsoft update for a critical IE hole.
Final on the bus, going really slow on the highway. I'll forgive the driving school for cancelling driver's ed - I'll have a heck of a t ...
Where the heck is the bus?
School bus is late - everyone is chucking snowballs at each other. Driver's ed was cancelled - school should also have been.
Ah shoot - was supposed to bring my passport so we could book our Israel trip flight. Hopefully they can make do with my name for now.
